document_data.name: Wesclodat
document_data.titles: the Aged{{Cite card/AD&D Trading Cards/1992|566|Wesclodat the Aged}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Wesclodat the Aged''' was a [[human]] [[Deneir]]an [[cleric|priest]] of unknown origins.
document_data.Description: In his old age, Wesclodat retained only thin whisps of long, white hair, and a similar beard. His robe was dyed deep blue.
document_data.Personality: Wesclodat kept a regular schedule, even as he grew old.
document_data.Possessions: Among his possessions was a ''[[robe of blending]]''.
document_data.History: None of Wesclodat's peers knew his origins, but some elders claimed he had once followed a different god, swapping to Deneir as the result of a trade between the two deities.
